name: IMP Name Generator (Helluva Boss)
description: Unleash your inner hellspawn! Get a wickedly awesome Imp name worthy of the Immediate Murder Professionals. Perfect for fanfic, roleplay, or just embracing your chaotic side.
introduction: Ready to join Blitzo, Moxxie, Millie, and Loona in the chaotic world of Helluva Boss? This generator will conjure up the perfect Imp name, blending sinister sounds with a dash of dark humor. Get ready to embrace your demonic destiny!
howToUse: Marvel at the ridiculously cool Imp name that appears.
Don't like it? Hit 'Generate' again! We've got enough diabolical combinations to keep you entertained for... well, not eternity, but a good while.
Share your awesome name with your friends and spread the infernal joy!

faqs.question: Are these names actually from Helluva Boss?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee that Blitzo himself hand-picked these names, they're inspired by the show's style and humor. Think of them as 'Helluva Boss-adjacent'.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my fanfiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Go wild! We encourage creativity and unleashing your inner demons (in a responsible, fictional way, of course).

faqs.question: Will I become an actual Imp if I use one of these names?
faqs.answer: Highly unlikely. But hey, if you do, send us a postcard from Hell! (Just kidding... mostly.)

faqs.question: Is this generator safe?
faqs.answer: As safe as summoning demons can be! We don't collect any personal data, so your soul is (probably) safe with us.

faqs.question: I didn't like any of the names. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! Or, get creative and mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create your own unique monstrosity. The possibilities are endless!

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes and suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Feel free to reach out and let us know your diabolical ideas.
